event.title: 1866, Hudson was a neighborhood and unincorporated village within the town of Marlborough, Massachusetts, and was known

data.event: Before its incorporation as a town in 1866, Hudson was a neighborhood and unincorporated village within the town of Marlborough, Massachusetts, and was known as Feltonville, and before that, known as Eastborough.

event.title: 1850 until the last shoe factory burned down

data.event: From around 1850 until the last shoe factory burned down in 1968, Hudson was known as a "shoe town."
From around 1850 until the last shoe factory burned down in 1968, Hudson was known as a "shoe town."
